vendor_name: Featured Hawaii Island Vacation Rentals by OUTRIGGER (formerly Kanaloa at Kona)
title: Hawaii Big Island Self-Contained Oceanfront Vacation Rentals Near Kona Country Club with Three Resort Pools
description:
Experience the magic of Hawaii's Big Island from an oceanfront condominium overlooking the beautiful lava flows of Keauhou Bay. This tranquil retreat is surrounded by 16 acres of lush tropical gardens, with the Pacific as its stunning backdrop.

Enjoy a round of golf at the nearby Kona Country Club, explore the vibrant marine life while snorkelling in the bay or savour poke, kahlua pork and other local flavours at the eateries nearby. The resort also boasts three swimming pools, two tennis courts and barbeques for leisure time at your home-away-from-home.
offer_address: 78-261 Manukai St, Kailua-Kona, Hawaii 96740, United States
